map

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • map.Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    A room in the dungeon. The room can house a creature, contain an item to be looted or hold some gold. Connected rooms have to be called according to their coordinates "x-y". The first room the player enters, has to be called "Entry". Use "none" if there is no room in this direction.

                           Player player,
                           Dice dice)
        Creature in the room will fight vs the player using the given dice
        Parameters:
        messenger - messenger that will generate texts for the GUI
        player - the player who will handle the fight
        dice - a dice the player and creature have to use

        public java.lang.String getRoomNameInDirection(int direction)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • selectImageName

        public void selectImageName(int straightDirection)
        Select a image file depending on players viewing direction and room content. Has to be called when player enters the room.
        Parameters:
        straightDirection - player's straight direction or negative value if direction is not important

      • spawnCreature

        public void spawnCreature(Creature creature)
        Spawns a given creature in the room. The room image will show this creature. This will replace a currently existing creature,
        Parameters:
        creature - the creature to spawn in the room.

      • storeGold

        public void storeGold(Gold gold)
        Stores a given gold in the room. This will replace a currently stored item.
        Parameters:
        gold - the gold to store in the room

      • storeWeapon

        public void storeWeapon(Weapon weapon)
        Stores a given weapon in the room. This will replace a currently stored item.
        Parameters:
        weapon - the weapon to store in the room.
